name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Voice Acting and Items
description: Sin descripción

name: Symphony Of Motion
description: Symphony Of Motion offers a new unique way to create and experience music without the need for any prior musical knowledge. Whether you're a seasoned musician or a complete beginner, this is a new and intuitive way to create and experience music. In its simplest form, you just move your hands around to create unique sounds, melodies, and rhythms. There are no “wrong” notes to worry about (as you always play in a specific scale) and you can always stay on perfect tempo with the build-in perfect timing assistant. For the more experienced musicians, it also offers a lot of customization options, a build-in looper, and new levels of expressional depth with its three-dimensional motion modulation, live pitch-shifting drums, and melodic pads.

name: Fazbear Nights 2: Quaesitor Mortis
description: After a long hiatus, Fazbear Entertainment welcomes you back to a brand new establishment! As Fredbear and Friends went out on indefinite vacation, it is time for new faces to take the stage and bring the joy to unprecedented levels! With outstanding ahead-of-their-time security technologies, you and your children will be safer at Freddy's than in your own home, so come on in and invite yourself to a delicious pizza, served by yours truly, Freddy Fazbear.

name: Altars of Madness
description: Altars of Madness is a set of 12 Doom 2 maps in Boom format created by me over the course of a few months. The target source port is prboom+ but we tested in a variety of sourceports. The maps are relatively small and can be beaten in under 10 minutes. Each map is designed to be pistol started, and a death exit is placed at the end of each map to force this (sorry continuous players).

name: He@rtstrings
description: When your red string of fate connects to three guys, what will you do?

name: Animalia Dreamland
description: Animalia Dreamland is a small single-screen platformer for the NES. In each level you play as one of two randomly selected animals, with randomized physics. For "Three Dreams" mode you play a random three of the 17 base levels, while for "Full Game" mode you play these 17 levels, in order, followed by a final 18th level. Pressing Select on the title screen toggles "Lucid Mode", where you choose your preferred jump physics.

name: Tactical Assault VR
description: Virtual Reality Tactical Shooter centered around CQB (close-quarters battles). Play solo or multiplayer coop to breach doors, clear rooms and defeat the enemy threat.

name: Thera 1
description: This entry of Thera follows the slapdash pilot broadcast of a TV program hosted by two remarkably stable and self-aware fragments named Hera and Despera.

name: RadiAngel
description: Waking up from stasis alone with no memories years ago Em has made peace with living a calm quiet life in her bunker, until one day while watching the cameras she spots a woman who needs help. Letting her into her life and bunker Em changes both of their lives forever...

name: Challenge of the Tentacle
description:
Challenge of the Tentacle is a free point and click escape room adventure fangame inspired by Maniac Mansion, Day of the Tentacle and Maniac Mansion Mania.

On a beautiful morning with chirping birds and sunshine, it seems a new beautiful day begins for the whole world. But no one knows that a catastrophe could happen that day. An evil, tyrannical, purple tentacle wants to take over the world. On this seemingly wonderful morning, our well-known protagonist, Bernard, renowned physicist and chemist, wakes up muddled. He still doesn't know that on this day he has to prove that he is a genius and has not, like so many others, studied in vain. But he's starting to remember the Purple Tentacle's visit and their argument about world domination, which ended with a cup of tea, his heavy, drooping eyelids and Purple Tentacle's malicious grin.

He is locked in his bedroom with many puzzles provided by Purple Tentacle to challenge and prevent him.

Help Bernard to solve these challenging puzzles, because with each solved puzzle he gets a little closer to the key that opens the door and thus also to the means created in his laboratory with which he can save the world from conquest. Solve logical, amusing and motivating puzzles that challenge not only Bernard, but YOU as well.

Inspired by Maniac Mansion, Day of the Tentacle and Maniac Mansion Mania.
Humorous game that combines point and click adventures with escape room tasks.
With many allusions to all adventures by LucasArts.
Various types of puzzles, from classic inventory usage to brain teasers.
You will find out the result of your performance at the end of the game: very good, good, satisfactory or bad.
And the best at the end: it costs nothing! It helps curb inflation!

name: Curseball
description: Welcome To Curseball! Your goal: hit the ball before time runs out. Simple, right?

name: Joyride
description: Joyride is a low-poly style racing game, You will drive your vehicle through roads with different scenery in different seasons, In this game, You can race with yourself, And even operate a drone to watch your driving process, Good luck

name: Hero Realms
description: From the makers of Star Realms Deckbuilding Game, Hero Realms combines the fun of deckbuilding games with the interactivity of trading card game-style combat. The Star Realms Digital Deckbuilding Game has been downloaded over 1M times. Like the hugely popular Star Realms app, the Hero Realms Digital game provides cross-platform play with full gameplay. In Hero Realms Digital, gamers choose their class, battle, gain experience, and level up fantasy-themed characters on iOS, Android, and Steam. Gamers can also adventure through story-driven campaigns and play Pit Fight mode against the AI.

name: Mida's Adventure
description: Mida's Adventure is a puzzle-adventure game where a young lady named Mida searches underground for lost 80's and 90's technological artifacts. Jump into a low poly, low resolution, 2d billboard sprite world filled with dangerous obstacles.

name: We Are Not All Alone Unhappy
description: “We Are Not All Alone Unhappy” is a short interactive narrative piece made in Twine which interrogates the idea of the Shakespearean happy ending. It asks players to create a pairing between two characters who received canonically unhappy endings in Shakespeare’s plays.

name: Guardener
description: Your garden is under attack! As a garden gnome, you grow and sell various vegetables to create an army. You'll pull out weeds, water plants and fight worms as you go through this year's seasons. Can you survive until winter?

name: Bad Monday Simulator
description: Battle against the fusion of Sans and Garfield - Sansfield! In this Undertale style battle simulator, you must quickly dodge attacks and use special moves and items to survive!

name: Until the Night
description: Economic strategy about building a toy factory for Santa Claus. Until the Night is a small economic strategy game that was inspired by Anno and Tropico game series.

name: Escape Simulator: Steampunk
description: This level pack includes four new escape rooms set on a beautiful airship "Valor".

name: The Journey: Episode 2 - Words of Wisdom
description: The second step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go... You won't regret this experience. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain...

name: BCI VR Horror Attraction: The Mad Trail
description: Meet BCI VR Horror Attraction: The Mad Trail created by members of BCI LAB room. This game gives you optimized fear by measuring brain waves during play. Also, you can check your shooting skills by scoring right after the expedition. Welcome to the tense BCI VR Horror Attraction: The Mad Trail.

name: Rob
description: ROB. We need your help defending Earth from Alien UFO's. Each one having different defenses. Please Rob your are only hope. Play as a Space Control Agent named Rob. Shooting UFO's out of Space to defend Earth.

name: Run Build Pew!
description: You’re being Bounty-Hunted! Run, Build your ship piece-by-piece and make it work with the parts you find, Destroy outposts and waves of fleets, and Pick your battles carefully to overcome your hunters in this Fast-Paced Top-Down Action Roguelite Shooter.

name: Falling Elevator
description: Welcome in Falling Elevator which is a casual unique game. Have you ever been stuck in an elevator? Well, if no, be ready for what's worse. Besides the fact you're stuck there with a few people, THE ESCALATOR IS FALLING !!!

name: Star Sled
description: Steer your lightning-fast Star Sled through multiple missions designed to test the reflexes of even the most dedicated space pilots! Encircle and capture life-giving Sparks with your Sled’s laser lariat while avoiding deadly Trion Sentries. Advance to the end and take on the Trion Emperor himself!

name: The Breadmaker
description: Welcome to the kitchen of the future! Learning to cook has never been simpler! Enjoy five days of easy to understand recipes guided by our brand new automated instructor. As she helps you with each day's lessons you'll discover that cooking isn't really as scary as you thought.

name: Departure.
description: Close your eyes, explore your imagination, and make your own fun using the toys scattered around your room. Find solutions and secrets that can help you on your quest to crack the door's five locks and be free of your confinement in this unorthodox adventure, puzzle solver.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: High Isle
description: Welcome to High Isle, a part of Tamriel never-before-seen in the Elder Scrolls. Explore the Bretons' idyllic ocean enclave and seat of chivalric culture as you confront the ruinous forces of the Ascendant Lord.

name: Smash Crates
description: Smash Crates is a local/online fighting game where you build, destroy and manipulate the battlefield to your advantage. Fight for glory with up to 4 friends as the Crates of myth and legend. Be there and be square!

name: Barnard's Star
description: Snipe your friends, electrocute your enemies and rain down acidic slime in the Barnard’s Star system, 6 light years from Earth. A multiplayer, turn-based tactics battler with no micro-transactions and no random chance — ingenuity is the only way to victory!

name: Saturday Edition
description: Saturday Edition tells the story of John Kornfield, a security technician who made headlines in 1976 with his account of alien abduction, life on another world, and eventual return to earth. Ten years later, Kornfield once again finds himself the subject of public interest when a string of disappearances coincide with sightings of mysterious lights in the night sky.

name: Dreamlander
description: Welcome to a world of dreams and nightmares! Go on a unique retro-inspired adventure, explore a living world, and enjoy a rich OST in this highly experimental/psychedelic RPG.

name: Rogue Arrows
description: Rogue Arrows is a roguelite action-rpg. Fight your way through the dungeons by upgrading your bow with powerful items, creating synergies, and choosing the right gear.

name: Ashina: The Red Witch
description: Get ready for adventure not like any other! This story is about Ash. An ordinary girl who takes an unexpected journey through the mysterious spirit world filled with strange creatures.

name: Scary Doll: Twin Sister
description: Scary Doll: Twin Sister is the horror game spinoff for the scary dolls chapter series. Once again, you need to escape from the killer doll on 1950's black and white anime gothic lolita style. The simulator gameplay is very simple, you only need to find the key and escape. But the horror is intense and not just a walking simulator. This is the beginning of the horrors!

name: Zeddytron 2081
description:
It's the year 2081 and servant robots have become commonplace, though too expensive for most people. In that same year, a large abandoned Sinclair warehouse is discovered with thousands of mint, working ZX81s and some genius decides to build a line of cheap and affordable robots using them: The Zeddytrons.

Based on ZX81s and huge rampacks (by 2081, rampack science has advanced significantly) the Zeddytrons become massively popular and the world fills with them ... until the unexpected happens! Wobblying rampacks cause the Zeddytrons to malfunction and declare mankind an obsolete species!

Your mission is to move through 50 waves, blasting Zeddytrons, avoiding undestructible Zeddyhulks and rescuing human survivors!

You can control your player using AWSD to move and JIKL to shoot simultaneously in 8 directions. Otherwise, you can use OPQAM / Cursor / ZXPand+ Joystick to move and shoot by pressing fire and the direction in which you want to shoot.

Good Luck!

name: Palo T Game and Watch
description: A reboot of the Game and Watch title Helmet, with Palo T as the protagonist.

name: Slendrina's Freakish Friends and Family Night
description:
Granny and Slendrina are hosting a get-together for all their family and friends, and the best news is, you're the main star of the attraction. You've been invited (read: taken) to their humble abode, where you'll spend countless nights meeting (and hopefully keeping your distance from) all your new friends.
Every night has you questioning if it could be your last... Can you survive the challenges they've prepared for you? Or will you meet a grisly end at the hands of one of the many killers wandering the dark corridors...?

name: Donkey Kong Land 2: Game Boy Color Edition
description: Donkey Kong Land 2: GBC Edition is a Game Boy Color conversion for Donkey Kong Land 2. It also adds the option to have the second Kong follow you and "New Kiddy Mode", which allows the use of Kiddy Kong as a third playable character.

name: Grainwind Incident 77
description: Grainwind Incident 77 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title.

name: Snookicker
description: An e-sport game mix of Football and Snooker. A pure 3D arcade game style playable on web browser directly, with keyboard or gamepad.

name: Oak Hill
description:
In this new short 2D adventure you play as Theo, a dog! After dying, you find yourself in Oak Hill, the dimension between life and death. You will have to face many challenges to reach your best friend Harriet to say goodbye and to move on.
Meet Spirit, the guide who will accompany you on this adventure.

name: Baba is You Xtreme
description: Baba is back in this short freeware puzzle game! Revisit familiar mechanics and experience some wacky new surprises! Are you Hardcore enough to complete all the levels??

name: Eye Can See You
description: “Eye Can See You” is an otome horror game that follows a girl with psychic abilities that allows her to see spirits. As she enters a new school, she finds spirits residing in her school and makes it her goal to help them fulfill their deeds. But there is evil lurking in the shadows with its own agenda.

name: Space 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The S.Sterling Co.
description: This is a game about three cats living in one office.

name: Conquest of Helios
description: Build your army towards the ultimate goal of ruling the entire continent of Helios. Think of Risk but with a bit more complexity.

name: Basketball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Panzer Girls
description: This is a fast-paced shooting game with simple operation. Together with the students of the girls' chariot academy, we forged the last line of defense to stop the monsters attacking like a flood.

name: Crazy Shark
description: You have to control a crazed shark that lives in the depths of the ocean. Declare war on all living things, but be careful, the military is hunting you! Eat vacationers, break yachts, wreck ships, destroying submarines and helicopters!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 3 - Season 3: Vibin'
description: In Chapter 3 Season 3: Vibin’, the Island is one giant party. Bounce around in Reality Falls, ride atop creatures, brave the Screwballer coaster, and revel with a new arsenal. Drop into Season 3 and spread the good vibes!

name: Stickman Synthwave Escape
description: Play as stickman, escape the mysterious secret laboratory and collect all the pills! Stickman Synthwave Escape has stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls, fun gameplay and synthwave soundtrack.

name: Yuza
description: Yuza is a gravity game with a story!

name: Time For Tom
description:
Time For Tom is apparently the world’s first complete Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragons and the Blade of Light hack! This is a 18-chapter new story featuring a great number of improvements to bring the oldest backwards FE game up-to-date.

The Akaneian archer Thomas, and his buddy Jake, find a forgotten Time Orb which they plan to use to prevent the War of Darkness and stop Hardin from receiving the Dark Orb. Unfortunately, they have no idea how to use it! So, they travel through some other games in the series on the way… How will they right the wrongs of history?

name: Bing Bong Blippo
description: Bing Bong Blippo is 9 map Vanilla episode that I had started back in late 2019 around the time I was leading Oops! All Techbase.

name: On Border
description: On Border is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore Jaretsuki's dream world and collect effects.

name: Falling From the Rabbit Hole
description: Falling From The Rabbit Hole tells a tale of Alice’s sisters, as it follows the scenario of “what if Alice never discovered the rabbit hole?” As a result, her two sisters fall into Wonderland instead and are forced to fulfill Alice’s destiny to wander the land and tell the untold story of its people.

name: Jumpwad
description:
Jumpwad is a set of 7 monsterless platforming maps for mbf-compatible
source ports (complevel 11). Explore strange worlds! Collect gems!
Seek out the Eternal Golden Flame!

name: Projekt: Passion
description: A futuristic adult visual novel filled with comedy, drama, violence, and romance. Features animated and voice acted cutscenes.

name: Poogers
description:
In a mapset where time is running out, where memes, are now dreams, and vice versa, and human emotion is no longer a valid format, there is one entity ready to put his foot down, and say no. Play as a lonely timid frog, determined to make his mark on a mapset that's ever so crumbling around him. Make your way through exhilarated, magnificent and enchanting landscapes. Move with frog, live with frog, breathe with frog. Be. Frog.

Examine the memes through the eyes of your frog, and allow the sun rays to reflect through the intricate pixels of the fireblu walls. Ever wondered what it would be like to platform in the doom engine? Controls reversed? Solve puzzles? Or how about owning your own revenant rocket with a personality more ecstatic and enchantingly realistic than any class clown or surf shop employee? It can all be done with Poogers.

name: Dance on the Water
description: Dance on the Water is a collection of 10 boom-compatible maps featuring challenging combat and platforming. Most of the maps are short to medium in length, except map 3 which might take more than 10 hours to beat on UV.

name: Endlanders: First Encounter
description:
Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real-time combat indie game.

Endlanders features two main characters with diverging storylines in the same universe, fighting and exploring their way through vastly different planes with anachronistic themes.

name: Will This Bitter Night Bring Change?
description: Follow Hornet and Emily in their attempt to escape the City, in all its neon glory.

name: Dragon Hunt Adventure
description: An adventure set in a classic rpg fantasy world.

name: Hacker Man
description: Joe, an experienced programmer at a reputable technology company, is fired by a director of the company, after having a romantic relationship with the director's wife. Very angry about the situation, Joe starts studying hacking, to get revenge for his firing.

name: Revived Forest
description: A 2D platform game. The main goal is to collect all the seeds and save the offspring of the ents. Be careful - there are dangerous orcs and lumberjacks!

name: Idle Galaxy
description: Relaxing idle clicker game with various gameplay features. Challenging enough for hardcore players but it also can be fully completed.

name: SuperDuck!
description: Explore levels, create paths for the ducklings to reach the exit and save them from being stranded in this puzzle platformer.

name: The Last City
description: Find food, build your colony, recruit new workers, feed your population, craft tools and equipment, cook food and research technologies!

name: Fung Guys
description: Fung Guys is an online multiplayer, team-based, party game, heavily focused on exciting PvP minigames.

name: Cyrah's Ascent
description: Cyrah's Ascent is a third-person combat game with high mobility. Imbued with essence, Cyrah must defeat the Laust and avenge her people.

name: Incubus
description: Incubus is a 2D simulation game. Get help from Incubus and have sex with various women for 30 days.

name: Lust & Magic: Chisalla in a Flower Basket
description: This is a story about a traveler and a girl born in the iron age. Machinery and steam technology have changed people's lives, but also, this was an era of hope, that "magic" is recognized as "Curse". The story of the "Iron Age" has begun...

name: NMDC
description: Your token, character sheets, and maps are endlessly customizable so you can adapt games to fit your quests, or create your own rules from scratch. Spark adventure, foster creativity, forge friendships, and unite tabletop communities across the globe with games that are easy to play.

name: Marisa's Inconceivable Journey
description: Marisa was suddenly summoned to a different world! It seems this world was invaded by alien. But the truth isn't simple. Now Marisa is in total isolation. She must fight to survive. Can she expose the truth, save the world and Reimu, finally return to Gensokyo?

name: Undarkened: Revival
description: Undarkened is a wizarding survival-adventure game where you must unravel the mystery of what, or who, corrupted your homeland. Explore a devastated world alone or with your friends, find out what happened, and try everything you can to save your home.

name: Yandere Onii-san ni Sokubaku Kankin Sarechau Game!
description:
You woke up and were chained in a strange space.
Apparently you've been imprisoned by a yandere boy!?

name: What Remains
description: What Remains is a vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2, featuring an original soundtrack. In What Remains, you will explore aquatic techbases and what lies beneath the ocean.

name: Rachel's Game Pack
description: A pack of minigames for the PlayDate

name: Elden Ring GB
description: What if Elden Ring released in 1993? Elden Ring GB is a demake of Elden Ring that runs on real retro hardware including all Game Boy consoles, as well as in emulators and on Analogue Pocket. You can also play it right here in your browser, though the other methods are recommended to allow for saving, better colours and higher accuracy. Explore all of the Precipice of Anticipation, Northern Limgrave and Stormveil Castle in this bite-sized demake experience made in GB Studio.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Deluxe Edition
description:
Time to explore Asian Food and become the best gourmet cooking master at your brand new food truck! Take orders, make delicious dishes and be fast to serve the hordes of hungry customers who will queue in front of your counter!

In this Deluxe Edition you will get both:
- Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine
- Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Expansion Pack #2

name: Digerati Presents: Indie Darling Bundle Vol. 5
description: A dynamic duo of acclaimed indies from Digerati! This bundle contains Unbound: Worlds Apart, and Apsulov: End of Gods.

name: Pop Pop
description: A fish-popping game for the playdate.

name: Crunky
description: An endless jumping game where you have to die to expand your Crunkipedia.

name: Pretty Girls Escape
description: Erase blocks of the same color connected to each other, slide the entire block left and right, remove obstacles, and lead the character blocks to the exit! Conquer stages, collect Pretty Girls' costumes, and enjoy dressing them up!

name: Super Toy Cars Collection
description: Super Toy Cars Collection includes all 3 Super Toy Cars games bundled together: Super Toy Cars, Super Toy Cars 2 and Super Toy Cars Offroad. Navigate your way through tracks made of supersized everyday objects such as toys, burgers, pipes, sandcastles, music instruments, and all sorts of crazy objects. Cause mayhem all over the place with the cool different power-ups and make sure you're the first one to cross the finish line!

name: Futanari Sex: Pool Party
description: A visual novel about two attractive women enjoying a sunny day at a private swimming pool. Everything takes a turn when Futanari Avery catches them fooling around in the water.

name: The Tyrning Combat Challenge
description: The player, Tal, has been issued a combat challenge. Participate in a one-on-one duel to the death in order to secure your team’s position in the Tyrning. Using artifacts secured during previous hunts, engage in melee combat with the opposing team’s champion. Made by four Drury University students.

name: Little Town Shooter VR
description: This game is a VR shooting game. You need to get money by killing opponents and unlock more weapons. Finally find a way to defeat the final boss.

name: Little Rhapsody of Game
description: In a mysterious modern park, together with up to 8 friends and players, incarnate into characters with overhead history, carry out a hard core and hot-blooded battle carnival, defeat opponents through sufficient reaction and technology, and become the king of the park.

name: Midnight Renegade: Recollections
description: A Victorian 2D action platformer where you shoot and slash through grunts until you reach their boss, the Chief Constable.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 09
description: Episode 9: Freaky Cryday! School Kid Cody is a newly descended Loser. He’d better get his cool back if G-Ma’s gonna let him back in the house!

name: Drunk Games
description: "Drunk Games" is a 2D top down shooter with Battle Royal elements. The player, surrounded by other characters, must collect as many bottles as possible, knocking them out of other drunkards!

name: Yakiniku Simulatior
description: Simple and easy game! Just chill out and simulate eating yakiniku!

name: Car Racing Trials
description: What better way to try out the newest, high performance cars than to take them for a drive on a race track?

name: Hell Division
description:
Hell Division is a game from the 3rd person, which is a battle of combat drones.

Become a pilot of an armed military drone and plunge into adrenaline-fueled action set in a cyberpunk city divided between two ruthless corporations. The confrontation is inevitable, the question is – will you prevail?

name: Ninja Break
description: Ninja Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Ninja themed items with a unique Katana paddle and Shuriken ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory.

name: Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins
description:
After the popular Apple Arcade game 'Frogger in Toy Town,' an all-new Frogger game 'Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins' (Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins) leaps into action!

Make your way through puzzle-ridden ruins and unravel the mysteries of the Ancient Salientians.

name: Memoir
description: A short memoir that recounts the memories of him first love

name: Nodes
description: Node production simulator. Purchase nodes to produce resources, so you can advance in the technology tree and build yourself a large production line. This game will satisfy your need for incremental simulators with the large amount of content.

name: Ten
description: Ten is a challenging platformer in which you face a relentless gauntlet of ten-second deathtrap rooms in a desperate struggle to escape your fate and uncover the truth!

name: Ink World
description: "Ink World" is a 2D platform jumping game with the theme of Chinese classical ink painting. The story tells that the protagonist constantly improves his abilities through battles, thereby eliminating many beasts in ancient Chinese legends.

name: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest
description: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest is a first-person adventure game that will contain multiple chapters. Chapter 1 has the story of a village that seems friendly, but every villager has their own dark secrets and the judgment day has come.

name: Hentai Big Tits
description: Hentai Big Tits - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Ticklish Tessa
description: Ticklish Tessa is a short interactive erotic BDSM game focused on tickling, pleasurable teasing, foot worship, and bondage in a consensual and playful setting.

name: What if your girl was a frog?
description: There was a frog. She was cheerfully croaking on her lake. However, she was not a simple frog, but magic. And so she got a lonely boy. She used her magic and started her adventures.

name: Aces Under the Moonlight
description: Smack your ball in your opponent's goal. Run, jump, and airdash your way to victory in this hand animated, high speed, punk-inspired ball game set against backgrounds of urban decay. Get ready an absolutely electric experience.

name: Zombie Scream
description: Terror descends on a Let's Play creator... Zombie Scream, the 2020 collaboration between the Tsugunohi corrosion-of-daily-life horror series and Japanese video creator Odaken, is finally available on Steam. How about experiencing a taste of the strange new world yourself?

name: Space Kabaam 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Speer DX
description: Throw your speer, use it as a platform, and puzzle-platform your way through 125 stages in this director's cut version of the classic Speer!

name: Super Perils of Baking
description: Super Perils of Baking is a ground-up remake of Lillymo Games’ very first title, 2018’s 2D platformer Perils of Baking.

name: Empyre: Dukes of the Far Frontier
description: Welcome to the bright lights and big city of New York in 1911. Never you mind the flooding. The water only goes up to the first floor. But not even the mighty waves of the Atlantic can drive New York into the depths. Now there is a new New York of self governing city-states perched atop buildings resting in the sea. This is your New York. You live in one of these City-States and now they need your help.

name: ConquestAreas
description: Capture flags to earn points. The first team to reach 300 points wins!

name: Mysterious Island: A Hidden Object Adventure
description: A game in the genre of "hidden object" - look for supplies, fight with predators, explore the surroundings. Discover all the secrets of the Mysterious Island!

name: Cursed Town
description: Cursed Town is a game about the story of an old abandoned town, from the Medievo to Classic times this place has been used for many purposes.

name: Cynoroid Forsaken
description: CYNOROID FORSAKEN is a free aim platformer that uses the mouse to aim and It is a free aim platformer where you aim with the mouse and move with the WASD keys. With multiple weapons, a laser chainsaw that can be used by right-clicking, and the ability to eat enemy carcasses.

name: Wonder Boy Collection
description: Four classic games from SEGA's influential platforming series

name: Ten: Ten Rooms, Ten Seconds
description: TEN is a challenging and brutal platformer in which you face a relentless gauntlet of ten-second deathtrap rooms in a desperate struggle to escape your fate... and find out what the hell is going on around here.

name: Cloud Island
description: Cloud Island is a linear game. You have to save your family, which was kidnapped by the hero's evil brother. As you progress through the plot, you will learn the story of the enmity between the brothers.

name: Belle Boomerang
description:
Face off against an army of ever-changing foes and turn their own powers against them in Belle Boomerang!
Play as Belle, the destined heroine, and master her legendary boomerang! Through the effects of a mysterious spell, the beloved monarchs have been transformed into hostile beasts! Defeat them in battle, lift their curse, and infiltrate the corrupted tower to raise the curtain on this evil scheme! But no boomerang alone can save this kingdom... Belle Boomerang will be tossing cherries, soaring through flame-filled skies, possessing ancient statues, and more!

name: Transit
description: You are not the chosen one who will save the world. You are just a person who is hoping for salvation.

name: Color Surge
description:
Drop your way to the top! Match 3 of a kind to clear the board in this addictive and colorful puzzle game. Compete against yourself or the world — and have fun!

Tetris meets Match-3 gameplay in Color Surge! Direct falling color drops to line up 3 or more matching tiles and clear them from the board. Play across 3 unique game modes, each with a dedicated global leaderboard. Challenge yourself by clearing levels with efficient combos to beat your high score!

name: Birdie Bartender
description: Help Birdie the bartender work her shifts so she can take a nice vacation!

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Major Update 1.14
description: This update includes the much-requested New Game+ feature and Ultra Hard mode for those who want to challenge themselves further, but also a host of quality-of-life features: the transmog feature allows players to easily customize the cosmetics of their equipped outfit to look like any other owned outfit, and with respec players are enabled to reset their skill points and redistribute them freely.

name: eFootball 2022
description: The Android and iOS ports of eFootball 2022.

name: The President
description:
Hey Mr President! Win the white house like a boss in your office while playing the best president simulator game! Your ministers are waiting for you to make the most important decisions as Mr President!

Win the white house and become the best president ever. This president simulator game will make you feel like a real boss of the state and get respect of everyone!

name: Undercover Girlfriend
description:
As a veteran private investigator working in New York City, you're used to cases having their own ups and downs, but things start to go really south when a beautiful woman randomly shows up outside your office.

This isn’t your typical investigation—there's something else brewing, and before you know it, you're staring into the eyes of an assassin sent to put a stop to your investigation! Can you get to the bottom of this web of crime before it's too late?

name: Love Pheromone
description:
"You either have it all or you lose it all! It’s only one of the two in this world.”

“You” have a very special love pheromone where the scent decides your class.
Your love pheromone can evoke human instinctual impulses!
Is this power a blessing or a curse?

name: Chiki's Chase
description: Help Chiki & friends dash past foes and get back home in this tricky, pocket-sized runner.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: El Dorado
description: In the highland jungles of South America lies the mythical city of gold: El Dorado. Putt your way through the ruins of an ancient civilization in the search for lost treasures, lost balls, putters, and just maybe the perfect game of Walkabout Mini Golf.

name: Memory Puzzle: Futanari Mistress
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young girl and her Futanari Mistress, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match. Flip two cards, and if the words on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image.

name: Fucking Hell
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 4 girls in Hell with different personalities, fetishes, and stories.

name: At the Party
description: Play with friends in person or remotely! A collection of party games to break the ice, have a laugh, and hang out playing. Play on your phones, or on any device with a modern web browser. No need to stream to everyone who is playing!

name: Aierlon
description: Invoke the Gods as you navigate an Ancient Temple in this thrilling First Person Puzzle Platformer

name: Pirates Jigsaw Puzzle for Kids & Toddlers
description: Dive into the fascinating world of pirates!

name: Project Clean Earth
description: Retro pixel hack'n slash action game to clean the mutated Earth. Strategically combine various weapons and drones in this roguelite with random artifacts and events. Find out the attack patterns of various mutant monsters!

name: Wings 1941
description:
Experience the thrills of the 10 most famous battles of World War 2 in this retro voxel shooter. Guide your aircraft through a hail of bullets and enemy planes, ships and tanks.

Upgrade your aircraft and take on the most epic bosses such as the Yamato Battleship, the great Zeppelin, the fearsome Tiger Tank and many more!
General Brandon will guide you through each mission. Do you have what it takes to beat the 10 epic campaigns like Battle of Midway, D-Day, Stalingrad, El Alamein and more!

name: Arcade Archives: The Tower of Druaga
description:
THE TOWER OF DRUAGA is an action RPG game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1984.
Go upstairs one after another while getting various items hidden on each floor of the huge tower controlled by DRUAGA, and rescue your lover KI who was trapped on the top floor.

name: QUByte Classics: Jim Power - The Lost Dimension by Piko
description:
QUByte Classics: Jim Power: The Lost Dimension by Piko is a classic action-adventure platformer that brings the special agent Jim Power, to save our planet from the supernatural alien, Vaprak.

His forces are too strong, a direct attack would not be effective and that’s why Jim Power has to slip through the defenses and attempt to stop this threat. It’s up to the player to reach Vaprak’s fortress and send him back from where he came.

Upgrade your weapons, jump carefully through the platforms, eliminate the enemies and reach the peak of your skills to save the planet in two Jim Power games, the 8Bit version and the 16-Bit!

name: Dissent
description: Dissent is a visual novel with choice-based progression and has a strong narrative focus. We will draw you into the corporate office of Moniker Innovation, where you will uncover mysteries that haunt the halls within. Discover friends, enemies, and uncover the truth behind what Moniker does.

name: Nova Odessa: The Demon Trainer
description: Nova Odessa: The Demon Trainer is a monster raising RPG with real-time combat. You feed and train your demons to make them stronger, and then put them to fight other demons. You can then spend your hard earned money buying better equipment and demons.

name: Space Penguins
description: Work with penguin chicks who mimick your actions to guide the minecart to the rocket! An action brain teaser where you solve gimmicks and aim to reach the goal within specific limits!

name: My Master's A Moron
description: "My Master's A Moron" is a 2D turn-based, tile-based roguelike & roguelite dungeon crawler. Explore your way through your Master's basement (that he happens to rent out to monsters) and discover a multitude of enemies, items, spells, armor, upgrades, and more.

name: Silent World
description: Get rid of fatigue in Silent World! Listen to relaxing music and casual skateboarding in the sunset or early morning. It’s just a simple 2D pixel game.

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator: Landmark Edition
description: Experience the beauty and detail of mowing the Great British countryside in Lawn Mowing Simulator, the only simulator that allows you to ride an authentic and expansive roster of real-world licensed lawnmowers from prestigious manufacturers; Toro, SCAG, and STIGA as you manage your business.

name: Caterpillar
description: In the world of shadows, guide the caterpillar through forests and fields, dungeons and mountains, where enemies and obstacles await you. Eat flowers, defeat enemies, and clear your path to keep going.

name: Survive 10 Minutes Please
description: Survive 10 minutes please is a hardcore action roguelike 2D zombie game combined with RPG elements where you have to survive 10 minutes against different types of zombies using different tactics.

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Memories Spent With You
description: I want to confess my feelings for you...

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets the Movie: Five Memories of My Time With You - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- The Quintessential Quintuplets the Movie: Five Memories of My Time with You
- Five-disc drama CD set

name: World of Mechs
description: World of Mechs delivers an online VR experience where players can select from 32 different mechs and jump into colossal online VR battles. Take advantage of unique mech abilities including high-tech cloaking devices, piercing particle cannons, and earth-shattering melee attacks in this futuristic spectacle of giant steel gladiators.

name: Deadcraft: It Came From the Junkyard
description:
A hulking behemoth named Revenant arrives with an undead army in tow to try and take over the Ark. It’s up to you to foil his plans and save the city!

Contains all-new missions and an original story featuring a truly fearsome foe.

name: Surface Rush
description: Show your reflexes and reach the Surface! Surface Rush is an arcade, skill based game, where you must throw Pumpum and make him bounce through the ocean bottom. Keep an eye on the oxygen bar and keep moving towards the goal.

name: The Golden Rose: Book One
description: Explore an alternative medieval Europe in this low-fantasy epic adventure! How far are you willing to go to take back your stolen treasure?

name: Jigsaw Fun: 3-in-1 Collection
description: Enjoy a collection of 300 high-quality jigsaw puzzles of Wonderful Nature, Amazing Animals and Greatest Cities from all around the world. Change the size of your puzzle for increased difficulty and solve jigsaws up to 600 pieces. You can also play with up to 4 players to solve jigsaws together!

name: Hover the Edge
description: A fast-paced and challenging VR, hoverboard based adventure, you're an extractor for a well-funded group of individuals who manipulate the past to hunt for ancient artifacts.

name: Pretty Girls Speed
description: An easy to play fast paced game! Here comes the "Speed" card game! Quickly put out the cards that connect sequentially to the numbers on the table, and when all your cards are gone first, you wiin! Play a serious game with PrettyGirls and aim for the "Speed" throne!

name: Bass Monkey
description: Bass Monkey is a musical album set to a cartoony, hack n' slash arcade game! Assemble your band (up to 4 players) and play as a bass swingin' monkey or guitar swingin' panda! Collect bananas, smack away your fans, and top the (high score) charts before the album ends!

name: Daydream: Legend of the Eschelons
description: Imagine you're a kid back in the 90s. You woke up early because you're excited you're going to play your favorite JRPG. You grab a bowl of cereal and power up your Nintendo console.

name: The Last Clockwinder
description: Create intricate clockwork contraptions out of your own clones and restore life to an ancient tree. Your mission is to repair the Clocktower, an ancient haven for the galaxy’s plants and seeds.

name: Jean and Josie
description: Jean and Josie is a visual novel about the relationship of a Rabbit and a Kitty.

name: Girls Overboard
description: Join the cute anime girls of Girls Overboard on Kawaii Island for a Wet n' Wild vacation! People from across the world travel to the island chain of Kawaii in search of recreation, relaxation, and above all, romance. An idle crafting-style dating sim with animated 2D artwork!

name: Souldiers
description: Fight for your freedom in a sprawling fantasy world caught between the living and the fallen. Hone your skills in a retro epic featuring puzzle platforming, metroidvania exploration and crunchy soulslike combat.

name: Card Shark
description: Card Shark is an adventure game full of cunning, intrigue, and delectable deceit. Enter a world where you’ll need to play your opponents better than you play your cards. Cheat your way to the top of 18th-century French society. Master deceptions using card marking, false shuffles, deck switching, false deals, and more! Use your ill-gotten gains to buy your way into the closed world of high-stakes tables. Card Shark is a new adventure that’s all about playing your cards right.

name: Diablo Immortal
description: Diablo Immortal is a mobile Massively Multiplayer Online Action RPG (MMOARPG) co-developed by Blizzard Entertainment and NetEase, coming exclusively to Android, iPhone and iPad.

name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou: Rei
description: A remaster of the Higurashi fandisc that includes two side stories and other extras.

name: Crop Busters
description: Turn a barren scrap of dirt into the prettiest patch of soil in the heartland with Crop Busters, an entertaining endeavor from the makers of Farm Frenzy. Scarlett is excited when she returns to her grandmother's farm for the first time since she was a child. Her dreams of a perfect homecoming go awry though when she discovers that the homestead of her youth has lost its luster.

name: Forsaken
description: A medium / large Runic themed classic-style map with some pretty big encounters. The author's first release.

name: Sicko Sanctum
description: Sicko Sanctum is a score-attack boomer shooter hybrid that owns character action merchandise. Snag upgrades and some skill, keep battlin' till you get a high score that makes you feel like you've had just a neat little time playing the game :)

name: Mega Man: Speed Bomber
description: Sin descripción

name: Tapeworm Disco Puzzle
description: Tapeworm puzzle disco is a grid based puzzle game where you play as a tapeworm; the local night club owner. It's your job to make sure the fleas enjoy themselves. You'll be helping them collect blood, play bangin tunes and get them to gigs on time.

name: Mission R.I.S.K.
description:
Mission R.I.S.K. is a cybersecurity educational game.

Earth's citizens have launched a mission to collect eco-friendly energy from a far away planet. A crew of space explorers travels aboard the S.S. Fossil. As their second-in-command, you must keep the ship safe from potential and active risks.

During gameplay, users will learn risk assessment and task assignment principles. Your actions affect the outcome of the story and the safety of your crew.

name: Kolo Terorita
description: SiIvaGunner's antivirus has activated, and it wants to the delete the Harlem Shake by force! Play as Ajit Pai and use your weapons to defend the Harlem Shakeover at all costs.

name: Magipanels
description: Magipanels is a talent show-type event that attracts various magic users from all across the world. Contestants compete to demonstrate their magical prowess, the process of which is abstracted out into the form of the puzzle gameplay: the Magipanels grid, a device designed to be manipulated by channeling one’s magic into it.

name: D*Fuzed
description: D*Fuzed is a turn-based logic puzzle game, where just one wrong move might be your last. Defuse bombs to recharge your battery, avoid the explosions, and look out for other hazards along the way!

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Go
description: The 7th season of Pokémon Go, "Season of Go", is themed as a celebration of Pokémon Go itself. Some events included the in-person event Pokémon Go Fest 2022, the new character Rhi and the focus on Ultra Beasts and Ultra Wormholes.

name: Knockout City: Season 6 - City of Tomorrow
description: Look for Hideout updates, Boomerang Ball, League Play loss forgiveness, map changes, and numerous other updates!

name: Urban Trial Pocket
description:
Grab your bike and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fun, fast-paced gameplay, colorful visuals, and smooth controls.
Choose you bike to fit your style, either easy to handle to do impressive tricks or powerful to beat the clock. Do tricks with the tips of your fingers, with figures that have been made ultra accessible and controls adapted to touch screens.

name: Still Here
description: Go to school no matter when you are.

name: Niravasi
description:
In ages past, there existed a city unlike any other. From the strength and unity of humanity, Niravasi was born. But when a brutal war ravaged the world itself, Niravasi became lost to the depths of space. Some say its people remain unharmed, while others speak of dark horrors residing in its streets. In the end, these are just stories.

But Niravasi is real.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Ravager Edition
description: Far atop the frozen Valkürian Range lives a tribe known for their capacity to call the elements. Some fear their ravaging strength, but few know their true name.

name: Operation Defensive!
description: Operation Defensive is a tower defense game but instead of monsters following a track they follow a player. place down towers to fight those monsters and try to get to the highest wave you can! have fun!

name: Yoshi Heardle
description:
A variation of Wordle dedicated to songs from the Yoshi games.
It ended on August 14th, 2022.

name: The Minesweeper: Crew Bomber Expedition
description: The classic minesweeper for Nintendo Switch. Train your brain, increase your skill and, at the same time, have fun with this challenging logic puzzle.

name: Buzzed
description: Retro game where you help bees get pollen!

name: Elevator Action Invasion DLX
description:
A robotic invasion is underway, and only you and your partner can stop it in Elevator Action Invasion by UNIS. This listing is for the Deluxe (DLX) model. A smaller Standard model is also available.

Focusing on dual player shooting action, this action-packed game puts you into the shows of two well-armed special agents, who infiltrate a facility that has been overtaken by an army of evil cyborg soldiers. Take aim and earn combos to rack up the highest score, and use the elevator controls on the control panel to navigate through the complex.

Adding an extra dimension of fun to it, Elevator Action Invasion DLX comes in a striking upright cabinet that includes real doors that open and close in front of the screen, and a rumble base to make you feel like you’re really inside of an elevator!

name: Nachkriegsratten Punk-Rock Puzzle
description:
Is there anything better than a good, relaxing puzzle game?
Of course: A bad, not-relaxing puzzle game!
Nachkriegsratten (Post-war rats), probably the first punk band to combine life-negating noise with turtle-like deceleration in a puzzle game.
24 mouth-painted pictures in 6 different sizes. are you brave enough? Have you ever danced with the Lumberjack Bear in the pale moonlight? Hia Hua!

name: The Horus Heresy: Legions - Titandeath
description: Titandeath is a new expansion coming to the mobile game The Horus Heresy: Legions, bringing two new playable armies in the form of Loyalist Titans and Traitor Titans, new cards, and more.

name: AQtion
description: The father of Counter-Strike is AQtion! This fast-paced unexpected prequel is a multiplayer, team-based first person shooter that uses realistic weaponry and locational damage in action movie-like scenarios.

name: Shake Ground
description: "Shake Ground" is a classic top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker and the main goal is to defeat all enemies and survive in the battle.

name: Lawnmower Game: Mortal Race
description: Lawnmower game saga continues. Try to finish different tracks below the target time

name: Philosophical Jigsaw: The Zen Koans
description: Your daily dose of philosophy! Assemble puzzles and watch thought-provoking animations based on Zen Buddhism. To meditate and relax.

name: Merge Beasts: Defense Game
description: The evil Beasts are attacking our temple, and we need your help! Merge the Beasts by dragging them on top of each other to build up your defenses. Fight off waves of evil Beasts and take down bosses to unlock new levels.

name: Office Run
description: Free and exclusively on PC! Office Run is an endless runner game built around the office theme with 6 playable characters, leveling system, skills, upgrades, power-up items and online highscores. Start as new Intern in the company and move up the ladder until you become the next CEO!

name: Castle Reborn
description: "Castle Reborn" - old school 2D slasher. In this game you slash your enemies, dodge attacks and use the ancient magic against monsters. Try to survive in a mysterious castle, that is getting more and more dangerous.

name: Heaven Snakes
description: A new generation of a Snake arcade game with unique mechanics, fully in 3D and online! [Beta]

name: Insect Swarm
description: The swarm is a swarm of thousands of alien zerg, and you, as the only survivor of this wasteland, you need to face them and fight with blood, good luck!

name: Mortmentum
description: Fight endless waves of different enemies using your grappling hook in clever ways while trying hopelessly to stay alive just a little longer so you can get a higher score.

name: Mad Bullz
description:
Now you have a chance to take revenge on those filthy people, and ram them with your horns.
It's up to you how you will fight, as you can control bull's movement with keyboard and rotate freely his head (neck) with a mouse.

name: Two Colours
description: Jump from platform to platform, red to blue, blue to red, timing your jumps precisely, and dodging falls and blocks which kill you over the course of 40 levels, grabbing the 20 collectibles to unlock a secret at the end of the game. Don't lose your focus, don't lose your patience.

name: Dungeon Delvers
description: Dungeon delvers is a third person action fighting rogue like. Slay hordes of monsters with ever increasingly powerful gear. Hunt for synergies to unlock godly powers and destroy ever increasingly more difficult enemies.

name: Eyes of Darkness
description: Psychological horror, featuring early 90's graphics and music, vast player's freedom and multiple endings! Leonard White, a professional inspector, is looking for his ex-girlfriend, Kimberly Frances, gone missing in Goodsprings, a small town near Nevada holding the darkest secrets...

name: The World of a Mermaid
description: Welcome in the underwater world of a mermaid, with aquatics creatures & the queen, welcome in The World of a Mermaid!

name: HopDodge
description: HopDodge is bringing back classic grid based platforming, with a new twist! Hop around on the back plane, and dodge spikes, wolves, and cannons in the foreground. Every level is built using an in-game editor, so players can create their own limitless content.

name: Erroneous
description: Join the Battle with your Friends in this futuristic First-Person Shooter with Team Deathmatch, Free-for-all, King of the Hill, and more!

name: Tinyfolks
description: Train your folks, defeat monsters and upgrade your town!

name: Patient
description: You are a patient of a psychiatric clinic. You don't remember anything about your past. A certain orderly helped you escape, because he knew that you were here by mistake. You need to find out the real reason of it.

name: The Dream Team
description: A fanmade game about Mr. Fruit and the Dream Team. A semi-linear turnbased RPG puzzle game where you play as Fruit, Rob, Blue, and Poppy to save reality from permanent sleep. Plenty of references, and a story deep enough to have things to spoil.

name: Mini Putt Camelot
description: Hear ye! King Arthur enlists noble mini putt players for his most righteous quest yet: Paying Arctic Arcade money! With 54 holes and unlocks aplenty, this is family fun for ye little urchins. Let’s get ready to dance... with swords!

name: Disinfection
description:
Disinfection is a sci-fi horror game, developed by Evil Turtle Productions, set in the depths of space, where you can play alone or as part of a crew of up to 4 players. You'll be tasked with identifying and destroying deadly nanomachine outbreaks on a variety of procedurally generated space faring vessels whilst fighting for survival.

The game features procedurally generated levels and the stats of the monsters are randomly generated. Players have to use a variety of tools to find the infection and destroy it.
Players will be hunted by horrifying amalgamations of flesh and machine, whilst having to deal with the dangers of living in space as the environment is being corroded away slowly but surely, causing oxygen deprivation and machinery/tool malfunctions.

name: Gleaner Heights: Season 2
description: The first major expansion for Gleaner Heights! Brand new farming content, new people to meet, and a gripping main plot unlike anything you've ever seen in any farming game!

name: Bike Clash
description:
Climb as high as possible in the global ranking - in the advanced competition system. Customize your favorite bike to increase speed, train, and win!

Bike Clash is a game where you can challenge players from all over the world! Prove your mountain bike driving skills to them. Get unique trophies indirect multiplayer competition. Compare your results with the best and take part in various events.

Drive through the various mountain and forest trails! Discover new locations, compete with more and more powerful players.

name: DC Worlds Collide
description: DC Worlds Collide is a mobile video game based on DC Comics characters.

name: IT Simulator
description: IT Simulator is a co-op horror game where two players attempt to return power to an office building. Take the role of the all-seeing Control Room or the stealthy Repair Technician as you risk everything to d̶i̶s̶c̶o̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶t̶r̶u̶t̶h̶ escape.

name: Hack and Slime
description: What could be scarier than a massive dungeon-tower infested with skulls, ogres, and dragons? That those same monsters ride the largest multinational in the world with it. You know; business is business.

name: Grim Tranquility
description: Grim Tranquility is a sci-fi-themed roguelite, tactics-based RPG where you explore alien worlds and battle vicious enemies in your quest to establish the first human settlement in space. Will humanity finally learn from their past mistakes or are they doomed to repeat the avoidable tragedies of their ancestors?

name: Deathrun TV
description: The greatest gameshow on earth is here with breakneck speed, bullet dodging action and lots of guns. Put it all on the line for the (rogue)likes. And remember, the run is all that matters.

name: Silt
description: An underwater exploration game: Explore the depths of a surreal, hand-drawn abyss. Possess sea creatures and make use of their unique abilities to solve environmental puzzles, traveling ever deeper into the void…

name: Zorro: The Chronicles
description: Zorro: The Chronicles is an exciting and humorous game featuring combat and exploration gameplay inspired by the best action games in class.

name: Police Shootout
description: Police Shootout is a new turn-based FPS game. Put on your uniform and get ready to respond the most surprising calls in your policeman’s career. Solve cases and gain experience, but also find out why a good young policeman gave up his career in a big city and moved to a small town of San Adrino.

name: Roojack
description: Roojack is a 3D, Puzzle, Platformer, Isometric video game, where you control both Maple and Whippy alternately.

name: Minecraft: Young Gru
description: Sin descripción

name: Io. Brimstoneburg.
description: Large lava castle / tomb map for vanilla Quake.

name: Donkey Kong RNDMZR
description: Sin descripción

name: Gaslamp Cases 4: The Arcane Village
description: Detective Morgan Johnson and his partner Jack Brown have solved many cases that have left their colleagues stumped, but the one mystery they've never answered is the origin of their friend Eleanor. While following Eleanor's trail, Morgan and Jack find themselves stranded near an isolated village where dark rituals are performed.

name: Quake: The Punishment Due
description: A free DLC for the 2021 Quake remaster made from a mod for the original Quake.

name: Livid Meadow
description: Livid Meadow is a short, story driven action platformer.

name: Slipgate to a Lost Dimension
description: A small single classic-style map inspired by id base maps but with some eldritch monsters.

name: Genshin Impact: Hidden Dreams in the Depths
description:
Version 2.7 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Yelan and Kuki Shinobu
• New main story quest: Interlude Chapter, Act II - "Perilous Trail"
• New story quests for Yelan
• New hangout events for Kuki Shinobu
• New main event: Perilous Trail
• …and more!

name: Minecraft: Ice Age
description: Ice Age freezes the overworld in this mammoth mash-up! Discover the lost world of dinosaurs and acorns a-plenty with the help of Baby Scrat. “It's time to get Buck Wild!”

name: Kemono Friends: Kingdom
description: Welcome to "Kingdom", an abandoned large-scale theme park where you will meet a diverse cast of animal friends and embark on a miraculous adventure with them. But beware of the azure monsters scattered throughout the Kingdom! With the help of your animal friends' unique characteristics and the landform organs' mechanisms, you can overcome these mysterious enemies and save the Kingdom together.

name: ArduGolf: 18-Hole Mini Golf
description: ArduGolf is a 3D Mini Golf game created for the ArduBoy.

name: American Truck Simulator: Lode King & Prestige Trailers Pack
description: We are happy to introduce a total of 15 highly detailed trailer models and compatible accessories, available in a wide variety of configurations, officially licensed from Lode King and Prestige Trailers for American Truck Simulator.

name: Neko Night
description:
It was business as usual in your life as a freelance writer, until you were tasked with writing about your first sexual experience. You try your best, but how can you write about something that never happened?

There is a knock at your door. Who could it be?

Standing at your doorstep, drenched from the rain, is a young, beautiful... catgirl?! She seems to know you, yet you have no recollection of her. She claims to be on a divine mission - to make a baby with you! But she's not the only unexpected guest. A second catgirl shows up soon after with the same higher calling...

This must be a dream, right? Well, you might as well have some fun while you find out.

name: Cozy Islands
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainz Plus: Newcastle Shunter
description: Shunt several coal cars, car carriers and cement hoppers around TYNE the massive rail yard just outside Newcastle station. Full scripted shunting session with cut-scenes and audio task details and commentary.

name: Trainz Plus: DR/DB DBmtrue/DBmu748
description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: Trainz Plus: Model Trainz - Geneva Sub Division
description: One of my favourite lines is the Geneva Sub. This route comes to Trainz using the track plan based on Daryl Kruse's layout featured in the Model Railroad Planning 2013 issue and the September 2016 issue of Model Railroader.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Canadian Rocky Mountains Ottertail to Castle Jct
description: Drive the picturesque Ottertail to Castle Junction section of the Canadian Rocky Mountains railway, travelling through the famouse U spiral tunnels!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Shortline Railroad
description: A fictional route in the USA where the Burlington Northern railroad uses GP38-2 locos to help serve the industries that rely on the railroad for their main source of transportation and for local runs on the main line. Welcome to the Shortline Railroad!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Schwaeninger Land
description: Enjoy the rush of speed at 250 km/h in the ICE 4; service the Auringen - Schwaning branch line with local trains;

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Amtrak F40PH
description: Amtrak F40PH locomotive two pack, with Phase II and Phase III liveries. Feature full custom cab, automatic running numbers, animated wipers, gecko script, and more.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Shmmns Coil Transporter
description: Get on board and extend your vehicle fleet with this highly detailed Shmmns-Coilwagon. Two sessions for the free Niddertalbahn route are included in this package.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: DR DBmtrue 001
description: Carry passengers around your routes with these highly detailed European passenger coaches!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: RVSX Vegetation Control Train
description: Complete vegetation control train. SW1500, Tool Car, Crew/Dorm, Chemical Cars, Scripted Weed Control Car with animated spraying arms that you can control. The sprayer car is scripted and animated, controlled via the 'view details' window.

name: Trainz 2022: Inzer - South Ural Mountains
description: A beautiful replica of the railways of central Eurasia, in the Ural mountain range.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Chiyoda Branch Line
description: The Chiyoda Branch Line is the Tokyo Metro Line in Tokyo, Japan. This route will bring you the landscape of Japan's suburban city.

name: Trainz 2022: Quinnimont Coal Drag
description: This package includes the "C&O 2-6-6-6 H8" locomotive and a brand new detailed session. Quinnimont was a marshalling yard for coal loads from the surrounding mines. Trains were assembled here to be shipped to Clifton Forge and beyond. Empty cars were also made-up here for the mines in the area.

name: MoriArashi
description: Aim for the goal using many many characters in this 2D physics based game!

name: SnowRunner: Land Rover Dual Pack
description: Upgrade your SnowRunner vehicle collection with the Land Rover Dual Pack, bringing two generations of the legendary Land Rover Defender, faithfully rebuilt for the first time in SnowRunner.

name: Vacation Island
description: Vacation Island is a short reverse-horror game, with a tiny open world to explore and dark secrets to uncover. Made in 14 days for the 2022 Spring 32bits Jam.

name: Crusader Kings III: Fate of Iberia
description: The sun-kissed lands of Iberia await your glorious rule with Crusader Kings III: Fate of Iberia flavor pack. Deeply rich in history, culture and people, the peninsula’s medieval destiny is ready to be shaped by your majestic hand, be it clad in conciliatory velvet or as an iron fist.

name: Morbius Heardle
description: It is a clone of Sonic Heardle, a clone of Joywave Heardle (modeled on the original Heardle).

name: Shishi: Timeless Prelude
description: Shishi : Timeless Prelude is a colorful dungeon role-playing game. As Elia, a young mage, you will explore the depths of a sacred sanctuary to complete your training to become an Oracle.

name: Horizon Midnight Sky Combat Aircraft: War Arena Flight Simulator 2022
description: In this game you will not be playing lightly, you will have to develop strategies, battle techniques, and skills to survive the air war.

name: Ante Mortem
description: What would be your first and last wish if you died tomorrow? Explore this mysterious and frightening island. Solve its puzzles. And discover the truth before sinking into the purest madness that can exist... That of knowing your death.

name: Destroy All Humans!: Clone Carnage
description: Wreak havoc in Clone Carnage! This standalone DLC comes with 4 modes, 6 maps, and up to 4-player multiplayer. Split-screen lets you double the damage in local 2-player multiplayer. Unleash your wild side in Rampage, Armageddon, Race, and Abduction modes!

name: Cien Años Después
description: Cien Años Después is an indie narrative puzzle/adventure game. All text is in Spanish.

name: Friday Night Funkin': V.S. Neco-Arc
description: A mod about the funkiest funny cat in the entire great cats village!

name: Roppongi Hunters
description: Join our protagonists in resolving the mystery behind the disappearing people and unravel the secrets behind it all in this classic turn based JRPG with a twist.

name: Spryward
description: 2.5D superhero beat 'em up platformer that transitions from motion comic panels to levels.

name: Godland: The Fire Quest
description: Fleeing a war, for absolute power, thinking themselves far from any conflict, the people of the island hope to live in peace... As a village chief, your role will be to protect your people from the catastrophe that is war...

name: Candy Eaters Tournament
description: Candy Eaters Tournament is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Chaste Tris
description: Chaste Tris is my first complete video game I have made. It is obviously based on similar other games but easier because there is no gravity. Blocks can be freely moved up, down, left, and right with the arrow keys. They can be rotated with X or Y keys and can also be held for later use with C.

name: Something Strange
description: Go about your normal every day life and meet new friends in this short visual novel!

name: God Edge
description: Travel across Azmra and slay barons using the God Edge; A sword capable of transferring power from the slain to the slayer!

name: Re: Collector
description: I woke up in a mysterious forest. I had no idea who I was or why I was here. Then, I met some friends and went on an adventure...

name: Saving Sheep
description: Saving Sheep - a simple 2D arcade shooter. The player is a shepherd, saving the lives of sheep and his own, fighting off a large pack of wolves.

name: Pentomino
description: "Pandomino" is also known as "brain racking twelve pieces". It is a hardcore spatial logic puzzle game suitable for young and old. The rules is very simple but challenging. Can you find the secret of the solution? NP->P? Find Your Way!

name: Invasion Vill
description: A traveler ends up in an accident, after which he is forced to find a way to escape the creature that is chasing him. Will you be able to find your way to survival?

name: Jewel Match Solitaire X Collector's Edition
description: Explore a fantastical world in this new Solitaire adventure and restore magnificent castles to their former glory! Play more than 1000 (!) levels while unlocking classic solitaire variants! Search every last level for gems that you can use to purchase new upgrades for each scene.

name: Hentai Packer
description: Hentai Packer is a unique but challenging puzzle game with high quality hentai girls. Pack them into tight spaces and unlock sexy scenes of your favorite girl!

name: Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe
description: Welcome to Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe! Survive and Thrive as one of many lovingly recreated European species.

name: Escape the Ayuwoki Demake
description: Re-experience the classic Escape the Ayuwoki adventure through this Demake, solving more complex puzzles and exploring new places with the old camera angles of 90’s horror games.

name: Intergalactic Taxi Co.
description: Intergalactic Taxi Co. is a casual puzzle game about picking up and dropping off passengers across a colorful, low-poly galaxy. Plan your route carefully to avoid running out of fuel and get everyone where they need to be!

name: Kongeer
description: Tribute to the arcade games of the early eighties (Popeye, Donkey Kong..). 1 or 2 players. Great difficulty and addiction as in the games of the past, but with a control more in line with current times. Help Sir Redhood and Sir Greenstone rescue the princess from the clutches of Kongeer.

name: Heartless
description: It's a 3D action game called Heartless. Heartless has the story of the protagonist struggling to escape the looming threat. Please enjoy the deep story and action with good hitting sense.

name: Tomorrow for Mar
description: Pass your final, graduate university and... finally confess?! Tomorrow for Mar is a 2.5D VN about crushes, tricky finals and starting a new chapter of your life.

name: Roy's Rugs
description: Fulfill your childhood dream and become an infamous intergalactic rug-trader

name: Insomnis: Enhanced Edition
description:
Insomnis is a first-person horror game focused on story, exploration and solving puzzles to advance through a terrifying atmosphere. Players take control of Joe Castevet, who will have to deal with a mysterious inheritance he has just received. Discover all the secrets of the Castevet mansion!

Insomnis: Enhanced Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Special Cover
- Artbook
- Set of cards

name: Shinogi Chess Club
description: At Yoshino High School, all that matters is your skill in Shinogi Chess. As the Spring Championships approach, Himiko Masaki investigates a dangerous organization and discovers a powerful ability. Climb the ranks, make new friends (and enemies), and search for answers in Shinogi Chess Club!

name: Monobehevo
description: This is a very tired person after work. He decided to make a game that can pass customs in one night.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022
description: Drive, Explore, Operate and Create the railroad of your dreams together with Multiplayer Surveyor! TRS22 Showcases a range of brand new routes, sessions and trains for you to experience as well as the most advanced Trainz Simulator features ever!

name: The Infernal Return
description: The Infernal Return is a role-playing adventure game. Players will play the role as Koward, a guy who was abducted to the netherworld to sort out puzzles, collect items and eventually find his way back to life. Meanwhile, the game provides multiple branch quests and fun gameplay.

name: Billy 101
description: Meet Billy, a robot who is tired of his work on the production lines, who then decided to blow up everything and everyone in order to make his own choices. Shoot robots, solve puzzles with your mechanical arm, blow things up and try not to get blown up before confronting your boss!

name: Total Anarchy: Pavilion City
description: Welcome to the late ’90s. Explore the fully open-world of Pavilion City, a former paradise now consumed by corruption and violence. The anarchic hooligans, the devious guerrillas and the far-right legion are all vying for control of the city and everybody seems to want you dead.

name: Twelve Floors Below.
description: A claustrophobic horror game taking place in an elevator.

name: Pinku Kult: Hex Mortis
description: Welcome to RAZORE CITY – a desolate, grim metropolis with one big problem: DEMONS. Control your own Razore City denizen as you investigate bizarre happenings around the city and track down the mastermind behind it all in this narrative-based RPG!

name: Twilight Wars: Declassified
description: Twilight Wars is a dungeon crawler in a cyberpunk setting, where teams of secret agents fight for the interests of corporations. Revive a secret organization, recruit and equip a team of specialists - and neutralize those who stand in your way!

name: Influence, Inc.
description: Manage a digital influence agency in this strategy-simulation game about modern-day propaganda and advertising. Manipulate social media and the mainstream news to promote celebrities, market products, and even sway elections. Research, share, leak, and target your way to influence.

name: Rhythm Stars Climbing
description: Rock climb to the rhythm and beat to become the best star

name: Wayfarers Edge
description: Venture into a perilous and once impassable mountain range in Wayfarers Edge! An RPG focused on traversing unknown frontier lands in a fantasy/western setting to take hold of your future. Travel together with other brave settlers and build bonds to help overcome the dangers together!

name: Corpse Factory
description:
Discard your sense of morality and enter the world of CORPSE FACTORY. Experience fear and suspense in this chilling visual novel!

CORPSE FACTORY is a visual novel driven by pure suspense. It's part horror and part psychological thriller. The story is told in a linear fashion, with a few key choices to make along the way that will affect the ending of the game.

name: Rogue Sweeper
description: In addition to the rules of Minesweeper, we will explore the stage by making good use of the items obtained during the exploration. Various treasures are hidden in the treasure chests along the way. Let's collect treasures steadily in the Unique world of gypsy jazz with stages full of surprises!

name: Captain of Industry
description: Factory construction and management simulator. Alone with your loyal crew, expand a small colony of survivors into an industrial empire! From an abandoned island to vast factories, research labs, and space program. Build, mine, farm, shape terrain, explore and take care of your settlement!

name: SnowRunner: Season 7 - Compete & Conquer
description:
The Season 7: Compete & Conquer DLC is included in the Year 2 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Race in exciting trials with Season 7: Compete & Conquer. This season introduces two brand new vehicles and a map set in Tennessee, USA, bringing a whole new playground packed with activities. Challenge your friends in intense racing challenges, or go alone in time-trial events!

name: Open Fortress
description: Open Fortress is a free Team Fortress 2 mod that introduces new gamemodes, weapons, characters, maps, and more to the world of TF2. These additions, crafted by over a hundred community contributors, build upon the iconic mid-century aesthetic of TF2, the gameplay features of classic FPS games, and the creativity and innovation of the Source engine modding community.

name: Flight of Nova
description: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

name: Dwerve
description: Dwerve is a Zelda-like action tower defense RPG where you play as a dwarven tinkerer that uses turrets and traps to fight.
Detective otome game.

name: The Museum
description:
As a security guard, the night shift at the museum is usually quiet. Not tonight.
The Magna Carta has been stolen by an interdimensional master thief and only you can get it back.
Embark upon a chase through the palaces, battlefields and castles of Britain as you solve royal riddles in pursuit of your quarry.

name: Sora Game
description:
A fast paced precision platformer starring Tokino Sora!

Take Sora through short but challenging stages surrounding a variety of Hololive's talents! The levels are made to feel satisfying to speedrun with practice, and additional special challenge stages can be unlocked through gameplay.

name: Trainz 2022: Leadville Subdivision
